guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a Par 4 that will give you a very good chance at an eagle. Play your drive up to the end of the first fairway before the rough. From there, you'll have a short iron to the pin. But if you get tailwind, go for the green!

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 698 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="698" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 178 748 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="178" cy="748" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 796 C 130 416 130 416 186 229" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 229 L 241 135" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="796" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="229" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="241" cy="135" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: Depending on the wind you can go for a power slice to get to the green in one. Use max overpower combined with right sidespin and right curl. Use about 2 bars of backspin. This is really only an option if you get tailwind. It's a tough shot but can help you a lot in a tournament.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 698 C 70 420 70 420 166 225" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 166 225 L 233 126" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="698" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="166" cy="225" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="233" cy="126" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 178 748 C 70 420 70 420 166 225" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 166 225 L 233 126" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="178" cy="748" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="166" cy="225" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="233" cy="126" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 796 C 70 420 70 420 166 225" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 166 225 L 233 126" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="796" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="166" cy="225" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="233" cy="126" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 11 Shootout - Wind Pointed at 10 O'clock

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is a par 3 that will give you a decent chance at the hole in one. From the first tee you'll be playing a long iron and from the second and third tees, you'll be using a wood. Bounce before the green with 3 bars of backspin and let the ball roll up to the the pin. Aim a little left as the green slopes from left to right. If you're using the Guardian, you can use max backspin and land directly on the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 238 544 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="238" cy="544" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 270 604 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="270" cy="604" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 294 660 L 250 259" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="294" cy="660" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="250" cy="259" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: Put your drive in the little fairway "hole" near the bend in the fairway. Playing this way, it's very important to stay in the fairway since it can be hard to reach the green in 2 if you put your drive in the rough or bunker. The dark rough close to the fairway on the left is out of bounds so be sure to avoid it.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 122 829 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="122" cy="829" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 119 873 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="873" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 916 L 247 368" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 247 368 L 182 117" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="916" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="247" cy="368" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="182" cy="117" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: With tailwind you can take a more aggressive line. Use max overpower, max left curl and max left sidespin. If you don't have a lot of curl on your driver you can use a hook shot but you can bring the OB on the left into play. With the perfect tailwind, you can land your drive on the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 122 829 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="122" cy="829" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 119 873 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="119" cy="873" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 118 916 C 291 596 291 596 205 305" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 205 305 L 174 119" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="118" cy="916" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="205" cy="305" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="174" cy="119" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The main approach will be to use the side of the fairway and let it bounce up to the green. The fairways on either side slope to let you bounce your ball around the bunker and up to the green. The spin is important and you should use one bar of right sidespin and 3-4 bars of backspin. If you get a left to right wind, use 1 bar of left sidespin instead. With tailwind, adjust with 4-5 bars of backspin.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 519 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="181" cy="519" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 594 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="594" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 205 670 L 234 227" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 234 227 L 204 191" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="670" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="234" cy="227" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="191" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: You can also use this approach to bounce over the rough and bunker. Keep in mind that the green is elevated and you need to avoid using too much backspin. With lower winds, this may be the best approach but watch out for the fringe glitch playing this way.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 181 519 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="181" cy="519" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 193 594 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="193" cy="594" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 205 670 L 186 245" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 186 245 L 188 203" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="205" cy="670" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="186" cy="245" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="188" cy="203" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: The normal way to play the hole is to bounce your drive on the first fairway and over to the second. From there you will have a long way to the green so you'll need a wood with a lot of distance. Be aware that the trees on the right side of the fairway are in play so going too long on your drive will leave you with a more difficult second shot that will require curl. Also, leaving your approach short on the green will leave you with an impossible putt, so make sure you get it down towards the pin or leave it short for a chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 815 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="168" cy="815" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 862 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="150" cy="862" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 125 906 C 276 693 276 693 312 530" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 312 530 L 333 403" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 333 403 L 215 137" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="125" cy="906" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="312" cy="530" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="333" cy="403" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="215" cy="137" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This path is only an option if you get tailwind for your first shot and you're playing from one of the front 2 tees. Use some backspin to avoid running through the fairway. Your approach will be the same as the black path.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 168 815 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="168" cy="815" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 862 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="862" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 125 906 C 310 690 310 690 343 459" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 343 459 L 204 139" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="125" cy="906" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="343" cy="459" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="204" cy="139" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

resources.title: Tour 7 - Layup Technique Strategy for Success

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is an option in any situation except headwind. You'll need to either play way out to the right or long enough to take the trees out of play on your second shot. With the trees out of the way, you'll have a great chance for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 L 181 108" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 181 108 L 109 131" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="181" cy="108" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="109" cy="131" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is a good way to play with the exception of a strong left to right wind. Use 3-4 bars of backspin, max left sidespin and full left curl. Land your drive on the small fairway and you'll be left with a perfect shot at eagle on your second shot.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 C 141 387 141 387 105 259" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 105 259 L 85 215" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 85 215 L 93 161" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="105" cy="259" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="85" cy="215" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="93" cy="161" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: With tailwind you should try to go for the green. Use the small left fairway to bounce over the bunker and to the green. Even if you land in the bunker, you'll have a great chance for the eagle. To make this play perfect, you should make the second bounce on the rough just over the bunker.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 146 563 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="146" cy="563" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 148 611 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="148" cy="611" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 150 660 C 57 353 57 353 75 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 75 251 L 89 159" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="150" cy="660" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="75" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="89" cy="159" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: This is the best and safer way to play. If you get some right to left wind, don't forget to use a little bit of right sidespin to straighten out when you hit the fairway. Just to the left of the pin, the green slope severely down. Better to stay safe on the right side of the green than having a hard putt for your birdie.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 154 523 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="523" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 609 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="155" cy="609" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 156 697 L 256 215" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 256 215 L 262 168" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="697" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="256" cy="215" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="262" cy="168" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This may seem like an easier way to play the hole, but you will have a really hard time getting the ball to the pin. You'll need to use a lot of topspin to get the ball up onto the green. If you land short on the green, you'll have a very tough uphill putt for the birdie. Better to stay on the fringe for the chip.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 154 523 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="154" cy="523" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 155 609 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="155" cy="609" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 156 697 C 124 329 124 329 168 150" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 168 150 C 175 96 244 95 248 128" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="697" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="168" cy="150" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="248" cy="128" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: A very tough par 4 that requires you to put your drive in the fairway or you'll have a hard time making the green in two. Without tailwind, go short and use a Big Dawg or Cataclysm to get to the green on your second shot. Use 5-6 bars of backspin and bounce over the water to the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 160 342" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 160 342 L 210 81" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="160" cy="342" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="210" cy="81" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: This is only really an option with a left to right wind or a tailwind. Go directly to the second fairway on the right. From there, you'll have a long iron to the green which you can bounce over the water or land directly on the green (which will require a lot of backspin to hold.)

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 183 241" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 183 241 L 216 80" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="183" cy="241" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="216" cy="80" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: With a right to left wind you can play up the left fairway. Keep in mind that the trees along the water are in play so you need to setup your second shot in a place where they won't block you out. You can also curl around them. This is a hard line to make an eagle from.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 228 677 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="228" cy="677" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 237 726 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="237" cy="726" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 246 776 L 82 251" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 82 251 L 201 76" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="246" cy="776" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="82" cy="251" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="201" cy="76" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" />

guides.name: Black Path
guides.text: You need to place you drive on the left side of the fairway. ALL trees are in play which means that you can't go over them. You'll need to curl around so use a driver with a lot of curl comined with a ball with distance and sidespin. Don't forget to use some backspin and NOT topspin. For the second shot, you need a wood with distance and curl. You should be able to bounce before the rough over to the green. You can use the right side of the green to make the ball fall down to the left. If you make an eagle, BE HAPPY.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 209 608 209 608 182 444" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 182 444 L 161 326" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 161 326 C 143 220 143 220 183 109" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="182" cy="444" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="161" cy="326" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="183" cy="109" r="6" fill="black" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: White Path
guides.text: If you get some tailwind, you can use left curl and max overpower to bounce at the end of the first fairway and hop over to the second. From there you'll have an open shot to the green and a possible albatross. You can land your approach on the green or bounce over the rough onto the green.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 206 512 206 512 151 331" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 151 331 L 121 253" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 121 253 L 178 108" stroke="white" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="151" cy="331" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="121" cy="253" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="178" cy="108" r="6" fill="white" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

guides.name: Blue Path
guides.text: This approach only applies IF you don't have the possibility to reach the green on your second shot. You can play your second shot up to the left and leave a decent chance to chip it in for an eagle.

levels.name: Rookie
levels.svg: <path d="M 134 750 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="134" cy="750" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Pro
levels.svg: <path d="M 132 796 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="132" cy="796" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />

levels.name: Masters
levels.svg: <path d="M 129 844 C 209 608 209 608 176 444" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="0" /> <path d="M 176 444 L 156 326" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="1" /> <path d="M 156 326 L 128 93" stroke="blue" fill="transparent" stroke-width="3" class="guide-path" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="129" cy="844" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="0" /> <circle cx="176" cy="444" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="1" /> <circle cx="156" cy="326" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="2" /> <circle cx="128" cy="93" r="6" fill="blue" class="guide-point" data-guide-segment="3" />
